duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and engage with coworkers and residents.
Deliver meals, food, and drinks to residents and their guests with efficiency and professionalism.
Clean and reset areas of the community, including dining areas, food service areas, and residents' rooms.
Maintain a working knowledge of all menu items, preparation, time, ingredients, and method of presentation.
Relay messaging from residents to the kitchen about dining needs, food preferences, and orders, and special requests.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent preferred
